SELECT pro.id, pro.process_name AS processName, u.LOGIN_ID AS creator, uu.LOGIN_ID AS currentHandler, pro.create_date AS createDate, pro.`code`, pro.code_name AS codeName, pro.state, pro.flow_model_id, uuu.LOGIN_ID AS lastHandler, log.create_date AS lastHandleDate FROM oa_process pro LEFT JOIN oa_process_his his ON pro.id = his.process_id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user u ON pro.create_by = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user uu ON pro.assignee = uu.id LEFT JOIN oa_flow_form off ON pro.flow_model_id = off.flow_model_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.process_id, a.create_date, a.cur_assignee FROM ( SELECT a.process_id, MAX(a.create_date) AS max_create_date FROM oa_process_log a GROUP BY a.process_id ) b LEFT JOIN oa_process_log a ON a.process_id = b.process_id AND a.create_date = b.max_create_date GROUP BY a.process_id, a.create_date, a.cur_assignee ) log ON pro.id = log.process_id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user uuu ON log.cur_assignee = uuu.id WHERE his.user_id = #{userId} AND off.status != 0 GROUP BY pro.id ORDER BY pro.state,pro.create_date DESC
